document.full_text: netminder antti niemi clipped the detroit red wings for the second consecutive game, backstopping the san jose sharks to a 2-1 win on sunday as they took command of their western conference semi-final.
document.title: sharks put bite on red wings to grab 2-0 series lead
lines_and_colors: netminder antti niemi clipped the detroit red wings for the second consecutive game, backstopping the san jose sharks to a 2-1 win on sunday as they took command of their western conference semi-final.
